languages.text: {n}Инцендия Чорда погружена в изучение длинного пергамента. В левой руке она держит серебряную ложечку, которой аккуратно зачерпывает мозговое вещество из вскрытого черепа скорчившегося возле нее человека.{/n} "{name} фон Валанциус, мне докладывали о твоем прибытии".

{n}Incendia Chorda is absorbed in reading a long strip of parchment. Her left hand is holding a silver spoon, with which she is carefully scooping up brain matter from the open skull of the man contorted next to her.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. I was informed of your arrival."
languages.original_text: {n}Инцендия Чорда погружена в изучение длинного пергамента. В левой руке она держит серебряную ложечку, которой аккуратно зачерпывает мозговое вещество из вскрытого черепа скорчившегося возле нее человека.{/n} "{name} фон Валанциус, мне докладывали о твоем прибытии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is absorbed in reading a long strip of parchment. Her left hand is holding a silver spoon with which she is carefully scooping up brain matter from the open skull of the man contorted next to her.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. I have been informed of your arrival."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅·库尔达正全神贯注地读着手中长长的卷宗。她左手拿着一把银汤匙，小心翼翼地从旁边扭曲变形的男人切开的头骨中舀着脑浆。{/n}“{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，我已经听说了你的到来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is absorbed in reading a long strip of parchment. Her left hand is holding a silver spoon, with which she is carefully scooping up brain matter from the open skull of the man contorted next to her.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. I was informed of your arrival."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅·库尔达正全神贯注地读着手中长长的卷宗。她左手拿着一把银汤匙，小心翼翼地从旁边扭曲变形的男人切开的头骨中舀着脑浆。{/n}“{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，我已经听说了你的到来。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディア・チョーダは、細長い羊皮紙を熱心に読んでいる。左手には銀のスプーンを握り、彼女の隣で身をよじらせている男の開いた頭蓋骨から、脳みそをすくっていた。{/n}「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。お前の到着の知らせは、受けている」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is absorbed in reading a long strip of parchment. Her left hand is holding a silver spoon, with which she is carefully scooping up brain matter from the open skull of the man contorted next to her.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. I was informed of your arrival."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディア・チョーダは、細長い羊皮紙を熱心に読んでいる。左手には銀のスプーンを握り、彼女の隣で身をよじらせている男の開いた頭蓋骨から、脳みそをすくっていた。{/n}「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。お前の到着の知らせは、受けている」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia Chorda está absorta en la lectura de una larga tira de su pergamino. Su mano izquierda sostiene una cuchara de plata, con la que coge cuidadosamente masa cerebral de la cabeza del hombre retorcido de su lado.{/n} «{name} von Valancius. Me han avisado de su llegada».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is absorbed in reading a long strip of parchment. Her left hand is holding a silver spoon, with which she is carefully scooping up brain matter from the open skull of the man contorted next to her.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. I was informed of your arrival."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda está absorta en la lectura de una larga tira de su pergamino. Su mano izquierda sostiene una cuchara de plata, con la que coge cuidadosamente masa cerebral de la cabeza del hombre retorcido de su lado.{/n} «{name} von Valancius. Me han avisado de su llegada».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia Chorda ist in die Lektüre eines langen Pergamentstreifens vertieft. In der linken Hand hält sie einen Silberlöffel, mit dem sie vorsichtig Gehirnmasse aus dem geöffneten Schädel des Mannes löffelt, der gekrümmt neben ihr steht.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. Ich wurde über Eure Ankunft informiert."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is absorbed in reading a long strip of parchment. Her left hand is holding a silver spoon, with which she is carefully scooping up brain matter from the open skull of the man contorted next to her.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. I was informed of your arrival."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda ist in die Lektüre eines langen Pergamentstreifens vertieft. In der linken Hand hält sie einen Silberlöffel, mit dem sie vorsichtig Gehirnmasse aus dem geöffneten Schädel des Mannes löffelt, der gekrümmt neben ihr steht.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. Ich wurde über Eure Ankunft informiert."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia Chorda est absorbée dans la lecture d'un long rouleau de parchemin. Sa main gauche tient une cuillère en argent, avec laquelle elle prélève avec précaution de la cervelle dans le crâne ouvert de l'homme recroquevillé à côté d'elle.{/n} « {name} von Valancius. On m'a prévenue de votre arrivée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is absorbed in reading a long strip of parchment. Her left hand is holding a silver spoon, with which she is carefully scooping up brain matter from the open skull of the man contorted next to her.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. I was informed of your arrival."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda est absorbée dans la lecture d'un long rouleau de parchemin. Sa main gauche tient une cuillère en argent, avec laquelle elle prélève avec précaution de la cervelle dans le crâne ouvert de l'homme recroquevillé à côté d'elle.{/n} « {name} von Valancius. On m'a prévenue de votre arrivée. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia Chorda, uzun bir parşömen şeridini okumaya odaklanmış durumda. Sol elinde gümüş bir kaşık var, yanına kıvrılmış adamın açılmış kafatasından dikkatli bir şekilde beyin kaşıklıyor.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. Geleceğinden haberdar edilmiştim."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda is absorbed in reading a long strip of parchment. Her left hand is holding a silver spoon, with which she is carefully scooping up brain matter from the open skull of the man contorted next to her.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. I was informed of your arrival."

traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
